description.value: You make your foes fall painfully when you trip them. When you successfully @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Trip] a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Flat-Footed] foe, your target takes [[/r 1d6[bludgeoning]]] damage. On a critical success, the target takes 1d6 bludgeoning damage plus your sneak attack damage.
